column4: Hi, when I install Nvidia drivers (from nvidia webpage) they load correctly when doing a "gdm restart", but when I reboot, I get an error message stating that the driver could not be loaded. But if I run the Nvidia install again, and restart gdm it works !!! any way I can avoid having to reinstall the driver every time I reboot?
you need to uninstall the old ubuntu driveres first !!!...  type:   sudo apt-get remove nvidia*   then reinstall
it happend to me it says API mismatch on reboot  but install fixed it.. just remove the old ones first
